lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Okay. I go the rest of the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go all the way down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the light of a rave stick--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- to look by and you don't see Veth anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try stealth and sneak up on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has no idea where you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give her a wet willy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And DM, you described one of those things as waking up and in its little hot tub?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you saw it twitch in there and it just hit the glass tubing and you heard a (thumping).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start going down the rope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm next. Guardian of Faith, and I bop out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the armor? Did you take the armor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Caduceus is the next one down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait, Caleb is coming down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I gave it to you to identify it when you get a chance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm still hanging on the rope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. You don't have to do it now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was going to help somebody that needs it, but I don't think Caleb needs it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's just going to stand in front of the-- about 10 feet away from the-- five feet away from the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This quiet sentinel of divine energy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But somebody is going to block the tunnel, right? Like, to make it look, like, not obvious that we went down a tunnel, like put it-- I've been saying it! I've been saying it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to grab a bunch of shit and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a table or something. (pigeon coo)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just put a glowing guardian in front of the tube.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but not in front of the tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, one of us has to hold the rope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys go down and then I'm going to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get a table over to cover the hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'm now flying around the rope and I will take people down one at a time as they follow after.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You lie down on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You lie down on the ground--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you at least stand in front of me, so I have an audio reference?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So when the others come, they're like, "Oh my gosh, she fucking died!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, like-- okay, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll see who likes you and who doesn't really care.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. We don't have to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's workshop it. It's a first draft.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to bunch up, what is this rope affixed to, by the way? Now that you all have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Yasha, you're the last one holding it? So you're holding the rope for now it is like three or four people dangling from it where you turn into an owl and begin to carry people down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that just leaves me flying beneath the hole in the ceiling and going for the slip and slide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I got help, too, because I was just dangling from the rope this whole time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought she went down already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, can I try to cover up the hole that we're in with, like, a table or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Are you taking the rope up, or are you anchoring it to something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take the rope up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you pull the rope back up and you pack it away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. And then sort of try to get...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's plenty of debris here to pull and try and, you know--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- wedge into that space a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to start shimmying down the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, because this is-- Roll an athletics and/or acrobatics check on this one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you get towards it, you're able to wedge your arms on the side and glance over and you can see below (fluttering) the flying owl that is Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a heavy impact for you, but you manage to right yourself for the most part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, you've all been lowered down into the trees and you all begin to slowly climb down to meet, I assume on the bottom, beneath the canopy or are you staying in the tree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on down, guys, we're all here waiting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I'll stay in the branches above them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's oddly welcoming because it reminds you of home, but it's the least-- the least thing you would expect this far from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it's the worst thing to see, right? The worst part of home to see right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're dead, right? These things are just fucking dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try and inspect, could make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why a nature check, damn it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because this is understanding of nature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until we're on the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to try to talk to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get a little further in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't enough moisture and enough specific nutrients to maintain the sort of fungus or continued cycle of decomposition, which sets you off as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It feels like you're in a weird parallel version of the Savalirwood.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know it's about 300 feet, how far? I figure like three quarters into it, I'll try and talk to one of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which direction are you guys going? You're in the center of the chamber, of a large circular room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast-- Yes, it's very dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a little light going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Locate Object at a higher level?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't necessarily mean it has a higher effect, but you can burn the spell slot to still use a lower level spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, I'm using a lot, but I'll do another Locate Object.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you know that direction is tugging you towards the threshold crest that you were seeking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Are you all traveling standard speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealthily? All right. Everyone make a group stealth check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for Caleb, who is flying around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the tree cover too thick to be flying like 20 or 30 feet above or would I just be in the branches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So their canopies all collide pretty intensely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who would be the first pair in this marching order?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there no writing on the outside of this archway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There would be writing. Do you still have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It lasts an hour, so I'd have 30 or 40 minutes left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. And it's not concentration, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caduceus, have you ever tried talking to the corrupted plants in the Savalir?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I... I think I'll I'll try once we're all in the tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to try, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you could be there as well, that might be a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you never try talking to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if we can help, we will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Speak with Plants from the necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll just reiterate what Caduceus said as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is still life in these trees, though nowhere near the semblance that you've grown accustomed to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to throw up Detect Magic with Comprehend Languages still going because both can be happening, and I'm going to apparate Frumpkin down in front of me and say: Just 20 feet up, quiet as you can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's with Caleb at the front?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go with Caleb at the front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should have Jester close to the front so she can point the way? Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. Yeah, I'll go behind them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And who's next to Jester?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go next to Jester to protect her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then Caduceus would be in the rear, so probably would Beau and Yasha after that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be keeping an eye behind us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb's eyes are just wide as saucers trying to see any writing, any arcane sigilry anything that is bad for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And since it is lightless beyond the light that you carry with you into this chamber, Caduceus, you do see a faint, familiar blue glow, barely visible just beyond the stairway ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the stairway is beyond the intersection?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's a left and a right, but we can pass that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And my spell is guiding us--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding you across and down the stairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just have Frumpkin (footsteps) up to the intersection and look both ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll perception for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just look, cat! Just look! That is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Don't see anything one way or the other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you saw the blue light down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so there's the intersection straight ahead, and the stairs descend downward and you see a faint, a little bit of blue light coming up from beyond the stairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And as Caleb and I come up to that intersection--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So Frumpkin just waits there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to look right, I'll look left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have better investigation than Frumpkin, so I'm going to look up the left hallway here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we do like the one eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Around the barrier, slicing the pie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Detect Magic still up, writing, all that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Detect Magic. As you approach towards that intersection, you sense a faint magical barrier that can entirely encompasses that T-section hallway ahead of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So before we even get there that I catch that vibe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a school connected to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I imagine so; let me double check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, like, we can't go forward?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there are Dispel Magic in the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Evocation is what you would get from this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d10 and add your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release the Dispel Magic, you watch as the barrier vanishes ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Inch a little closer and do what we planned?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll actually summon the sword as well and (whooshing) kick it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now that you have that visual perspective with your sword now lighting it up even further, further instills the question of just how well this all will continue to stand and for how long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord and Caleb are going to do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to slice the pie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cross, there's no barrier, no issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just darkness in each direction?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far can your globules go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could just (whooshing) one in each direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Between the two of us, we should be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, um. I can make light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where have you been keeping that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter) I was like, "Am I looking at this correctly?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have Light? You have the Light cantrip?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I have the Light cantrip.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not sure how I missed that this whole campaign.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can like pop it on anything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can pop it on something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like glove, or your sword, or something like that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pop it at the end of my sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the front of the sword begins to glow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should have thought of that. (whooshing) Fire in my hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at you. You're a trendsetter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the additional light and with the sword out there as well, you can see that both sides of this hall end about 35, 40 or so feet beyond on each side, and you can make out, with what light you have, that there are detailed glyphs carved into the top and bottom of each of these sides, which you envision would be the anchor points for this wall that was previously there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's keep going. Let's take out this crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stepping down the staircase, the familiar blue light begins to fill the chamber before you, as you come to a nearly identical room as to the one that you previously found in the ruins of A5.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the large, carved, faintly glowing glyphs that reach across from the center of the floor, to the far wall and up the wall, and there, atop and in the center, you see embedded, the large, glowing, blue threshold crest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) We'll pick up from there next time as you guys have located your second threshold vault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to break it or take it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should try to break it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we should take it because then it's a bargaining chip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! They're going to kill us and take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then it means we might get to see the city come.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, I have so much more I want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got time, you got time to figure out what you're going to do while we await our next episode.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And is it Thursday yet? Good night.
